title: SMS commits to becoming carbon-neutral by 2030
lead: The smart meter installer will adopt renewable on-site generation and the use of EVs for its operations in the UK and Ireland

title: German solar batteries demand soar by nearly 50% in 2020
lead: The annual market for stationary battery storage will double by 2025, new report estimates

title: Sweet move! Sugar in your fuel tank
lead: New petrol mix made of biofuel could cut emissions by 750,000 tonnes

title: Environment Agency: Climate emergency hitting ‘worst case scenario’ levels
lead: Chief Executive Sir James Bevan said if left unchecked, climate change will kill more people and do much more harm, than COVID-19

title: EDF to start construction of new Scottish wind farm
lead: The 30MW project is expected to take up to 15 months to complete

title: EU approves €254m Romanian aid to upgrade district heating system
lead: The district heating system in Bucharest is the largest of its kind in the EU and the second largest in the world, serving 1.2m people

title: Facebook rolls out climate change labels to poke misinformation
lead: The labels on posts aim to redirect users to official figures and facts about climate change

title: Slovenia referred to EU Court over wastewater treatment failures
lead: According to the Commission, certain areas do not comply with the requirements because urban wastewater entering collecting systems is not subject to the appropriate level of treatment before being discharged

title: Scottish Parliament unanimously supports Heat Networks Bill
lead: The Scottish Government is targeting the equivalent of 650,000 homes to be connected to heat networks by 2030, from the current number of 32,000

title: SSE Renewables and Acciona set up Iberian offshore wind alliance
lead: They have signed an exclusivity agreement for the 50/50 joint venture to enter the emerging Spanish and Portuguese offshore wind markets
